nodes.text: Dual Cannon was a weapon installed in the Arakyd Industries security droid Zeeo. It fired large waves of energy and was capable of killing multiple enemies, however, it consumed large amounts of Zeeo's energy.
The Dual Cannon appears only in the Nintendo DS version of the game. To use it, players must first achieve the Maximum Alliance status by using Zeeo to help Rianna to defeat her foes.
